name: AudioBufferResource
desc: A resource that contains audio data in memory.

items.name: init(buffer: AVAudioBuffer, inputMode: AudioResource.InputMode, shouldLoop: Bool)
items.desc: Creates an audio resource from the given buffer that optionally plays with a 3D effect or restarts from the beginning after it finishes.

items.name: var shouldLoop: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio restarts from the beginning after it finishes.
